name: Toasted Breadcrumbs
author: Terri-Lynn Howell-Schlaiss
summary: All the breadcrumbs you want, at a great price.  Add your own seasoning so you know what you are getting!
ingredients: 10 slices whole wheat bread, or your favorite bread
directions: Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
Using tongs, place bread slices directly on oven racks
Leave in oven until hard and golden brown, about 30 minutes; darker if you prefer
Remove and cool on wire rack
Crumble slices into a large bowl until reduced to fine crumbs, or place in bowl of  food processor and process until fine
